CustomField.description: Purpose: This field calculates the total invoice amount from QuickBooks. Calculation: Derived by adding the Primary Quote Amount and the Sales Tax from the related opportunity. Data Source: Auto-pulled from the primary opportunity quote when the Estimate Status is set to Invoice Sent. Formula: Amount + Tax_to_collect__c Usage: Used to track the invoice amount for reporting, reconciliation, and syncing data with QuickBooks.
CustomField.label: Invoice Amount (QB)
